src_original: katamaśca bodhisattvasya gotravihāraḥ /  kathaṃ ca bodhisattvo gotrastho viharati /  iha bodhisattvo gotravihārī prakṛtibhadrasantānatayā prakṛtyā bodhisattvaguṇairbodhisattvārhaiḥ kuśalairdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
tgt_original: 性自成就菩薩功德菩薩所應眾多善法。

src_original: tatsamudācāre saṃdṛśyate /
tgt_original: 於彼現行亦有顯現。

src_original: prakṛtibhadratayaiva na haṭhayogena tasmin kuśale pravarttate /  api tu pratisaṃkhyānataḥ sāvagrahaḥ sambhṛto bhavati /
tgt_original: 由性仁賢逼遣方便令於善轉。 非由思擇有所制約。 有所防護。

src_original: sarveṣāṃ ca buddhadharmāṇāṃ gotravihārī bodhisattvo bījadharo bhavati /  sarvabuddhadharmāṇāmasya [sarva]bījānyātmabhāvagatānyāśrayagatāni vidyante /
tgt_original: 住此住中任持一切佛法種子。 於自體中已具足有一切佛法一切種子。

src_original: audārikamalavigataśca bodhisattvo gotravihārī bhavati /  abhavyaḥ sa tadrūpaṃ [saṃ]kleśaparyavasthānaṃ sammukhīkartum /  yena paryavasthānena paryavasthitaḥ anyatamadānantaryakarma samudācaret /
tgt_original: 性不能起上．煩惱纏。

src_original: kuśalamūlāni vā samucchindyāt /
tgt_original: 造無間業或斷善根。

src_original: yaśca vidhirgotrasthasya gotrapaṭale nirdiṣṭaḥ /  sa gotravihāriṇo bodhisattvasya vistareṇa veditavyaḥ /  [iti] ayamucyate bodhisattvasya gotravihāraḥ /  tatra katamo bodhisattvasyādhimukticaryāvihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 廣如種姓品說　云何菩薩勝解行住。

src_original: iha bodhisattvasya prathamaṃ cittotpādamupādāya aśuddhādhyāśayasya yā kācidbodhisattvacaryā ayamasyādhimukticaryāvihāra ityucyate /
tgt_original: 謂諸菩薩從初發心。 乃至未得清淨意樂。 所有一切諸菩薩行皆此住攝。

src_original: tatra gotravihārī bodhisattvastadanyeṣāṃ [sarveṣāṃ] bodhisattvavihārāṇāmekādaśānāṃ tāthāgatasya ca vihārasya hetumātre vartate hetu parigraheṇa
tgt_original: 當知前住於餘十一菩薩住。 及如來住。 唯有因轉攝受彼因。 於餘菩薩住。

src_original: no tu tena kaścitu tadanyo bodhisattvavihāra ārabdho bhavati na pratilabdho na viśodhitaḥ /
tgt_original: 尚未發趣未得未淨。

src_original: kutaḥ punastathāgatavihāraḥ /
tgt_original: 況如來住。

src_original: adhimukticaryāvihāriṇā punarbodhisattvena sarve bodhisattvavihārāstāthāgataśca vihāra ārabdhā bhavanti (Dutt 219)  no tu pratilabdhā na viśodhitāḥ /
tgt_original: 住此住中普於一切餘菩薩住。 及如來住皆名發趣。

src_original: dṛḍhāyāḥ sthirāyāḥ avivartayā bodhisattvabhāvanāyāḥ alābhī bhavati /  yathā bhāvanāyā evaṃ bhāvanāphalasya vividhānāṃ pratisaṃvidabhijñāvimokṣasamādhisamāpattīnām /
tgt_original: 如於勝修於勝修果無礙解．神通．解脫．等持．等至。 亦未能得。

src_original: (Dutt 221) pañca ca bhayānyasamatikrānto bhavati /
tgt_original: 未超五畏。

src_original: ajīvikābhayamaślokabhayaṃ maraṇabhayaṃ durgatibhayaṃ pariṣadśāradyabhayaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 謂不活畏．惡名畏．死畏．惡趣畏．處眾怯畏。

src_original: viṣayeṣu manāpāmanāpeṣu rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmeṣvekadā viparyastacittatāyāḥ /  upapattau tatra tatrātmabhāvāntare pratyājātasya pūrvakātmabhāvavismaraṇāt /  uddiṣṭānāmudgṛhītānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ cirakṛtacirabhāṣitasya caikadā vismaraṇāt /  evameṣu triṣu sthāneṣu muṣitasmṛtirbhavati /  ekadā ca medhāvī bhavati dharmāṇāmudgrahaṇadhāraṇārthapraveśasamarthaḥ /
tgt_original: 三於所受持法久作久說有所妄失。

src_original: ekadā na tathā /  ekadā smṛtimān bhavati /  ekadā muṣitasmṛtijātīyaḥ /  na ca sattvānāṃ yathāvadvinayopāyābhijño bhavati /  nāpyātmano buddhadharmābhinirhāropāyābhijñaḥ /  haṭhena ca pareṣāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
tgt_original: 或具聰惠為他說法勉勵而轉。

src_original: avavādānuśāsanīṃ vā pravartayati /  sā cāsya haṭhena pravartitā na yathābhūtamājñāya /  ekadā ca vandhyā bhavatyekadā cāvandhyā /  rātrikṣiptānāmiva śarāṇāṃ yadṛcchāsiddhitāmupādāya /
tgt_original: 如闇中射或中不中。

src_original: ekadā ca cittamapyutpāditaṃ mahābodhādutsṛjati /
tgt_original: 或於菩提雖已發趣而復退捨。

src_original: ekadā ca bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānān nivartate notsahate vā /  ekadā sattvārthakriyāprayukto 'pi khedamantarā kṛtvā tasmātsattvārthakriyāprayogāt pratinivartate /  āśayataścātmanaḥ sukhakāmo bhavati pratisaṃkhyāya ca parasukhakāmaḥ /  bodhisattvaskhaliteṣu ca parijñābahulo bhavati /  no tu parijñāya parijñāyāśeṣa-prahāṇavān punaḥ punaḥ skhalitādhyācāratayā /
tgt_original: 或時捨戒。

src_original: ekadā neyaśca bhavatyasmādbodhisattvapiṭakadharmavinayāt /  (Dutt 222) ekadā gambhīrāmudārāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā utvrasyati /  bhavati cāsya cetaso vikampitatvaṃ vimatiḥ sandehaśca /  sarveṇa ca sarvaṃ mahākaruṇāsamudācāravivarjito bhavati sattveṣu /
tgt_original: 或利有情而生厭倦。

src_original: alpena ca hitasukhopasaṃhāreṇa sattveṣu pratyupasthito bhavati /
tgt_original: 利益安樂未廣大無量。

src_original: na vipulena nāprameyeṇa ca sarvāsu paripūrṇāsu yathānirdiṣṭāsu bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣate /
tgt_original: 於一切菩薩學中未能普學。

src_original: na ca sarvaiḥ paripūrṇairyathānirdiṣṭairbodhisattvaliṅgaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /  na ca sarveṣu yathānirdiṣṭeṣu bodhipakṣaprayogeṣu paripūrṇeṣu saṃdṛśyate /  dūre cānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodherātmānaṃ pratyeti /
tgt_original: 菩薩相中未皆成就。
